keyboard_get_numlock.htm+html.head.title: keyboard_get_numlock.htm+html.body.p:87-3
keyboard_get_numlock: You can use this function to find the status of the keypad number lock with true being returned for on, and false returned for off.

keyboard_get_numlock.htm+html.head.title: keyboard_get_numlock.htm+html.body.p:88-3
keyboard_get_numlock: NOTE: This functionality is only available in the Windows exe builds and will not function on any other device.

keyboard_get_numlock.htm+html.head.title: keyboard_get_numlock.htm+html.body.p:105-3
keyboard_get_numlock: The above example code will get the state of the numberlock key and if it is on (true) it will set it to off (false) and vice-versa.
